formattedAddress: 511 E 78th St, New York, NY 10075, USA
adrFormatAddress: 511 E 78th St, New York, NY 10075, USA

originalText.text: We’re going on our second year of leasing an apartment from them. No complaints at all. Anytime we need something fixed, a maintenance guy comes that same day to fix it. The guys working in the leasing office are incredibly helpful and friendly. I highly recommend this complex as a great place to live!

originalText.text: The info office is incredibly rude. All correspondences with them need to be in writing. Which would be fine if they reliably replied to emails. When they do reply, it is usually in the form of rude and short responses, and they do not answer the actual question that you asked. I simply asked for the application link for an apartment and the info team responded in such a rude manner. They also don't sign the emails with their names so you have no idea who you are corresponding with.

originalText.text: My husband and I lived at 232 E 80th for almost a year. A few days after we moved in, we started getting harassed by our downstairs neighbor. After talking to the super, other tenants, and previous tenants, we learned that this has been an ongoing issue. The downstairs neighbor is a mentally ill elderly man, a hoarder, who’ll scream from the top of his lungs at anyone passing by his floor (5th floor), especially the neighbors living directly above him. Management is impossible to get through, and when you finally do, they claim that they are “not aware of the issue”. We know for a fact, that the tenant who used to live in the apt before us complained too. Other people in the building did. People who moved in after us did. Yet, the management always claims they are “not aware of the issue”. We called the police a few times, but after knocking on the mentally ill neighbor’s door a few times, they simply left, because “he didn’t open the door”. We were told that there’s a similar mentally unstable elderly lady living in one of their buildings on the same block, screaming at other tenants and blocking their way in hallways - the management doesn’t care. Our super was instructed not to talk about the issue with tenants. After we moved away, the situation got even worse. The mentally ill neighbor painted insults on all of the other tenants' doors, started urinating in public areas in the building, started stealing & damaging other tenants’ packages and mail, screamed at random people on the street etc. Avoid renting from this management company.

Our super was instructed not to talk about the issue with tenants. After we moved away, the situation got even worse. The mentally ill neighbor painted insults on all of the other tenants' doors, started urinating in public areas in the building, started stealing & damaging other tenants’ packages and mail, screamed at random people on the street etc. Avoid renting from this management company.

originalText.text:
I can not say enough about this place, that I lived for about five years. First lets start with staff, the manager Steve is the most professional, amazing manager. Kelly, chelse, an amazing staff members. Anytime I have any issues, something to be fixed the super and  other workers amazing. It is like having a community.
I am grateful and happy to live there.
The buildings are clean, nice neighbors, the trash well kept. Friendly. Love love love love
